memberdef.argsstring: (System::SharedPtr< Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldStart >, System::SharedPtr< Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldSeparator >, System::SharedPtr< Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldEnd >) override
memberdef.name: Initialize

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the level of the entry.
Gets or sets whether page number in TOC should be omitted for this field.
Gets or sets the text of the entry.
Gets or sets a type identifier for this field (which is typically a letter).
